meanings.definition: A highlighted word or image in a document or webpage that, when clicked, takes the user to another location or document.
meanings.sent1: The hyperlink on the webpage led me to a fun game.
meanings.sent2: I clicked on the hyperlink to read more about the topic.
meanings.sent3: The hyperlink decided to take a detour and led me to a recipe instead.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a hyperlink, instantly transporting me to a happy memory.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue hyperlink stood out among the text, beckoning me to click.

meanings.definition: To create a hyperlink in a document or webpage.
meanings.sent1: I will hyperlink the text to the relevant page.
meanings.sent2: She hyperlinked the image to the main website.
meanings.sent3: The magician hyperlinked the rabbit to a carrot instead of a hat.
meanings.sent4: His words hyperlinked our hearts, connecting us in a special way.
meanings.sent5: The artist hyperlinked the colors, creating a beautiful digital masterpiece.
